results.name: Triangle read by rows: n-th row contains powers b^e with b + e = n + 1 in natural order.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Rows n = 1..125 of triangle, flattened
mathematica: Table[Table[k^(n-k+1), {k, 1, n}] // Sort, {n, 1, 11}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Nov 18 2019 *)
program: A247358_list = list(chain.from_iterable(sorted((b+1)**(n-b) for b in range(n)) for n in range(1,8))) # _Chai Wah Wu_, Sep 14 2014
xref: Cf. A051129, A003101 (row sums), A247363 (central terms), A003320 (row maxima).
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Sep 14 2014
